name: fretwork
description: Generate scales for western fretted string musical instruments (guitars and alike)
author: Edgars Binans

scripts.build: browserify src/fretwork.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] -t brfs | terser --ecma 6 > dist/bundle.js
scripts.dev: browserify src/fretwork.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] -t brfs --debug | exorcist -r .. dist/bundle.js.map > dist/bundle.js
